tab1.title1:
Welcome to BlackBoxFibercraft, Please click on the relevant tabs to read all the information
you may need!
tab1.text1: <RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">Please be wary we are currently in our early stages, we are always improving the server,click the discord button to have your say!</>

tab2.text1:
<TextStyle.White>Regarding external clients!</>

Cheating(ESPing, Aimbotting, spoofing to list a few) is not allowed
Dupping
Abusing anyform of ingame exploit/glitch
*Applicable to reports
-When creating a report ensure you have a minimum of 3 valid clips, clips must contain the accused ingame name(s).
Applicable to inis
*If and when using an ini your are not permitted to use the cheats on those ini programs this can include but is not limited to
*Speed hacks
*Insta Turning
*No recoil, etc



<TextStyle.White>Building Rules!</>

Creating Floating Builds - Snapping to world border is apart of this rule.
Blocking Vital Map Zones such as player spawns, dams, dens, obs(bosses), UW zones, AB zones, etc.
The exception to this rule being the ext titan caves and caves known as Lab, lava if your confused make a ticket and ill well you know.
Base spots that require the use of a teleporter, tek punch, chair, zipline, knockout strat, peli, etc are not allowed this included bases exposed to the mesh, Once you can crawl, walk or crouch in it's fine.
2 bases per map - the exception to this is VAL ab zone and GEN2 ocean biome
When building in unraidable spots like lava golem, lab, etc admins have the right to clear the unraidable part ie after the barrier.
Mesh defense is allowed however turrets(leave them on medium or low) is not to shoot through the mesh and no structures that do not pertain to defense are to be found in the mesh.



<TextStyle.White>Spam Rules!</>

Excessive turret ground spam - There is no number on this rule to prevent petty reports including a picture of the spam when reporting this will be up to the admins discretion - Replacing turrets is not apart of the rule.
Excessive spam, to minimize lag do not spam more than 40 foundations out of last turret tower rendered - This must done at a resonable distance.
